title: It seems Resolve 'Tough Skin' has a bug?

embed.description: (https://youtu.be/ERzquJQN4YE)이제 슬슬 무슨얘긴지 감이 오실꺼임특성 질긴피부를 찍었는데평타데미지만 막히는줄 알았더니평타데미지뿐만이 아닌 모든데미지에 대해서 데미지 감소를 시도하고있었다는 얘기심지어 E의 지속딜에도 적용됨질긴피부의 정확한 툴팁은 이럼뭐 툴팁오류라고 할수는 없는데말이야몬스터의 기본공격과 챔피언으로 부터 받는 피해량이 2 줄어듭니다 라고 써도될껄왜 일부러 이중적인 문장을 만들어놓은거임?? 이해가 안가네대충 요약해줌이전시즌을 거쳐오신분들이라면 아시겠지만 이전시즌 챔피언 기본공격 2...

body:
Hi.

(from Korea) In Inven, An user named 'Berto' has experimented with Mastery 'Tough Skin' which is Resolve 2 tier.

https://youtu.be/ERzquJQN4YE

http://upload2.inven.co.kr/upload/2015/11/18/bbs/i11663503897.png

http://upload2.inven.co.kr/upload/2015/11/18/bbs/i12263471394.png

As a result, as you can see, 'Tough Skin' reduces **all kind of damages** including each DoT damage by 2.  and in game tooltip, It says "You take 2 less damage from Champion and Monster basic attacks.". We(Berto and many Inven users) thought it means we take 2 less damage from Champion's basic attack and Monster's basic attack.

At first we thought it as a problem of ambiguous Eng-Kor translation process. But we found that the English tooltip looks ambiguous too (at least to us). So I ask here... Is it a intended or just a bug?

Plus(a result of the experience), as a result of this mastery, you can still recall while debuffed by 'Deathfire Touch' unless 'Deathfire Touch' damages you more than 2 per second. Thank you.

https://youtu.be/kj4xLep1lxI

replies.body:
Thanks for mentioning this, looks like Tough Skin's reducing all champion damage (that isn't true damage) by 2, rather than just the stated basic attacks. I'll follow up with the team that's been working on masteries tomorrow, that's either a significant amount of unintended power or a tooltip that really undersells the mastery. 

Also, on the off chance this reaches him/her, my thanks to Berto as well for spotting this and investigating it.

I thought i already posted this bug/interaction somewhere but im not sure.

I don't think it needs changing, 2 is such a low number anyway. Besides with DFT making dot mages very strong a little bit of countering is healty i think.

In casse you did not know {{item:1054}} does the same thing, It also blocks damage from dots. 

Perhaps these are bugs you want fixed. 
But It could also be used as a passive in a new defensive item, rather then nerfing the DFT mastery or the champions whom abuse it in conjunction with {{item:3151}} an option to build some defenses against this might be more helpfull.

If this is true and will be fixed, would it be possible that you assumed the Mastery's strength to be amicable even though it was stronger than intended? Which would mean fixing it would be a nerf and your prior observations would become void. 
tl;dr: Will Tough Skin (or the Resolve Tree) be compensated for this 'nerf' ?  

(I can already assume this goes against your philosophies, I just wanted to ask; just in case ...)

You should Re-post [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)

It is either a functional bug or a bad description either way it needs to be fixed.
